mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( m_no, id, password, name, phone, email, zipcode, roadAddress, otherAddress ) VALUES ( member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{roadAddress}, #{otherAddress} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password=#{newpassword}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, roadAddress=#{roadAddress}, otherAddress=#{otherAddress} WHERE m_no=#{m_no}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
select m_no, id, password, name, zipcode, roadAddress, otherAddress, phone, email, grade, TO_CHAR(regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regDate from member order by m_no desc
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, password = #{newpassword}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, roadAddress = #{roadAddress}, otherAddress = #{otherAddress}, grade = #{grade} WHERE m_no = #{m_no}
